title: Lover Extraordinaire
description: When Nora agreed to become Adrian’s lover, he’d made it clear that he didn’t want emotional attachment and she swore to herself to keep her feelings out of it: sex and lust, no strings attached. But with every night of passion they share, Nora falls harder for the man who doesn’t do relationships, and she quickly realizes that she wants to be more than Adrian’s lover. Nora longs for love, commitment and a happy ending. But can lust turn to love?As Adrian claims her body and heart over and over again, Nora decides that she’ll have to risk it all and admit her feelings to him, even if his reaction might break her heart. Will becoming Adrian’s lover turn out to be the worst decision of her life, or can Nora change his womanizing ways and convince him that she’s the one for him?
author: Cora Reilly
